  • Method Details

    • nbRounds

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams nbRounds(int nbRounds)
      Parameters:
      nbRounds - Maximum number of rounds to play [ 3 .. 100 ]

    • name

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams name(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - The tournament name. Leave empty to get a random Grandmaster name.

    • rated

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams rated(boolean rated)

    • rated

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams rated()

    • startsAt

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams startsAt(long startsAt)
      Timestamp in milliseconds to start the tournament at a given date and time. By default, it starts 10 minutes after creation.

    • startsAt

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams startsAt(ZonedDateTime zonedDateTime)
      Parameters:
      zonedDateTime - Timestamp to start the tournament at a given date and time.

    • startsAt

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams startsAt(Function<ZonedDateTime, ZonedDateTime> now)
      Parameters:
      now - Timestamp to start the tournament at a given date and time, from a given ZonedDateTime.now() instance.

    • roundInterval

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams roundInterval(int roundInterval)
      How long to wait between each round, in seconds. Leave empty for "auto". [ 0 .. 86400 ]

    • manualRoundScheduling

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams manualRoundScheduling()

    • variant

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams variant(Variant variant)
      Optionally specify a variant. Default value is "standard". Note, to use custom FEN, the tournament can not be `rated` and the variant must be standard.
      Parameters:
      variant - The variant to play in the tournament

    • variant

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams variant(Function<Variant.Provider, Variant> variant)

    • description

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams description(String description)

    • entryCode

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams entryCode(String entryCode)
      Make the tournament restricted with a entry code.
      Parameters:
      entryCode -

    • chatFor

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams chatFor(Enums.ChatFor chatFor)
      Who can read and write in the chat. Default only team members.

    • chatFor

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams chatFor(Function<Enums.ChatFor.Provider, Enums.ChatFor> chatFor)

    • position

      @Deprecated default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams position(String position)
      Deprecated.
      Use variant(Variant) FromPosition or Chess960
      Parameters:
      position - Custom initial position (in FEN). Variant must be `standard`, `fromPosition`, or `chess960` (if a valid 960 starting position), and the game cannot be rated.

    • allowList

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams allowList(Collection<String> allowList)
      Parameters:
      allowList - Predefined list of usernames that are allowed to join. If this list is non-empty, then usernames absent from this list will be forbidden to join. Example: List.of("thibault", "german11")

    • addForbiddenPairing

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams addForbiddenPairing(String player1, String player2)
      Usernames of two players that must not play together.

    • addForbiddenPairing

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams addForbiddenPairing(TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams.Pairing forbiddenPairing)
      Usernames of two players that must not play together.

    • addForbiddenPairings

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams addForbiddenPairings(Collection<TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams.Pairing> forbiddenPairings)
      Set of usernames of players that must not play together.

    • addManualPairing

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams addManualPairing(String player1, String player2)
      Manual pairings for the next round. Missing players will be considered absent and get zero points.

    • addManualPairing

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams addManualPairing(TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams.Pairing pairing)
      Manual pairings for the next round. Missing players will be considered absent and get zero points.

    • addManualPairings

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams addManualPairings(Collection<TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams.Pairing> pairings)
      Manual pairings for the next round. Missing players will be considered absent and get zero points.

    • addManualBye

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams addManualBye(String player)
      Give a bye (1 point) to a player, instead of pairing them with an opponent.

    • conditionMinRating

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionMinRating(int conditionMinRating)
      Parameters:
      conditionMinRating - Minimum rating to join. Leave empty to let everyone join the tournament.
      Valid values: 1000 1100 1200 1300 1400 1500 1600 1700 1800 1900 2000 2100 2200 2300 2400 2500 2600

    • conditionMaxRating

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionMaxRating(int conditionMaxRating)
      Parameters:
      conditionMaxRating - Maximum rating to join. Based on best rating reached in the last 7 days. Leave empty to let everyone join the tournament.
      Valid values: 2200 2100 2000 1900 1800 1700 1600 1500 1400 1300 1200 1100 1000 900 800

    • conditionMinRatedGames

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionMinRatedGames(int conditionMinRatedGames)
      Parameters:
      conditionMinRatedGames - Minimum number of rated games required to join.
      Valid values: [ 0 .. 200 ]

    • conditionPlayYourGames

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionPlayYourGames(boolean playYourGames)
      To be allowed to join, participants must have played their previous swiss game

    • conditionPlayYourGames

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionPlayYourGames()
      To be allowed to join, participants must have played their previous swiss game

    • conditionAccountAge

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionAccountAge(int days)
      Parameters:
      days - Minimum account age, days.
      Valid values: [ 1, 3, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 180, 365, 365 * 2, 365 * 3 ]

    • conditionTitled

      TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionTitled(boolean titled)
      Parameters:
      titled - Only titled players can join

    • conditionTitled

      default TournamentsApiAuth.SwissParams conditionTitled()
